name: Lorethem (itch)
description:
A small, third-person adventure game with action elements and a marvel atmosphere of magic world. The plot is pretty simple - wizard's apprentice attempting to save his teacher from the evil threat and it's up to you to help him on his way.

Key Features:

  • Beautiful fabulous game design, as well as sounds and music.
  • Funny NPCs.
  • Some light puzzles and platforming.
  • Lots of hidden treasures.
  • Learning a new spells/upgrades by collecting Magic Tomes.
  • Collect as many gold coins as possible to get higher scores.
  • The game is short (up to an hour), so there is no save system, but a decent number of checkpoints along the way.
